ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
cdt_name:
- cos6
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-cos7-x86_64
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.description:
For short, monitor-server-api helps you to collect, historicize and exploit the data from your tests
written with pytest and monitored with pytest-monitor
 * Centralize your tests results
 * bring support for *pytest-xdist* and *pytest-parallel*
 * Easy data querying through specific queries
 * Integrated library for in-script queries
about.summary: A REST API that can be used a central point for collecting metrics from pytest-monitor.

about.description:
For short, monitor-server-api helps you to collect, historicize and exploit the data from your tests
written with pytest and monitored with pytest-monitor
 * Centralize your tests results
 * bring support for *pytest-xdist* and *pytest-parallel*

about.summary: A REST API that can be used a central point for collecting metrics from pytest-monitor.

name: monitor-server-api

about.description:
For short, monitor-server-api helps you to collect, historicize and exploit the data from your tests
written with pytest and monitored with pytest-monitor
 * Centralize your tests results
 * bring support for *pytest-xdist* and *pytest-parallel*
 * Easy data querying through specific queries
 * Integrated library for in-script queries
about.summary: A REST API that can be used a central point for collecting metrics from pytest-monitor.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "monitor-server-api" %}
{% set version = "1.0.2" %}
{% set sha256 = "986320ed4b7b20feb64c4fa81e2240d72c4a057dd2c7d9016e7d7a2d68e300f8" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  skip: true  # [win]
  number: 2
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - flask <2.0.0
    - flask-restx
    - flask-sqlalchemy
    - sqlalchemy
    - pandas
    - requests
    - pyyaml
    - uwsgi
    - werkzeug <2.0.0

test:
  imports:
    - monitor_api
  requires:
    - pip
  commands:
    - pip check
    - type launch-monitor-server.sh  # [not win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/CFMTech/{{ name }}
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A REST API that can be used a central point for collecting metrics from pytest-monitor.
  description: |
    For short, monitor-server-api helps you to collect, historicize and exploit the data from your tests
    written with pytest and monitored with pytest-monitor
     * Centralize your tests results
     * bring support for *pytest-xdist* and *pytest-parallel*
     * Easy data querying through specific queries
     * Integrated library for in-script queries

  doc_url: https://{{ name }}.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/CFMTech/{{ name }}

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - js-dieu
